cont.entity_a: There is a bug in the Marvel chipset causing network crashes with Android devices.

Router stops broadcasting on 2.4 GHz and requires frequent reboots. The 5GHz band is unstable and requires frequent reboots. Router has hardware issues causing frequent drops. 5GHz signal turns off and requires frequent reboots. Router frequently requires resets to maintain connection.
cont.entity_b: Router reboots frequently and drops wireless connections hourly. Router frequently disconnects and reboots during downloads. Router handles PADT packets from ISP poorly, causing reboots. Router often reboots and fails to maintain time settings. Router frequently drops connections and reboots.

cont.entity_a: The firmware is easily modifiable for VPN setup. Flashable with DD-WRT and supports NordVPN configuration. Firmware lacks advanced customization. Frequent Wi-Fi dropouts after firmware update. Router is compatible with ExpressVPN firmware. OpenWRT firmware provides better customization.

Handles traffic from multiple devices well. Signal range and speed are improved compared to older models. Router provides good coverage and speed but lacks dual frequency. Router is durable and performs well for its price. Router has a good range and is compatible with OpenWRT.
cont.entity_b: Router is outdated but reliable for low-cost systems. Router works well with both 802.11b and 802.11g devices. Router provides good performance and easy setup. Router offers good speed and range for its price.

cont.entity_a: The web-interface is easy to navigate. Setup wizard has issues, better to configure via web interface.
Affordable for a tiered home or office wireless system.
Customer service sent a replacement product. Tech support is difficult to understand and unhelpful.
cont.entity_b: Customer service is poor with long wait times. Technicians lack knowledge on software and firmware.

cont.entity_a: Installation was easy, but required disabling VPN temporarily. Setup is easy and MUMIMO works well.
cont.entity_b: Reliable signal strength. Provides strong signal throughout the house.

cont.entity_a: Router runs hot and emits a strong odor. The router lacks a cooling fan, leading to overheating. Router is not open-source ready despite being advertised as such.
cont.entity_b: Product description is misleading about data transfer speeds. Router has dead spots and poor signal range.
Router offers strong WPA security with 128-bit encryption. Router has strong security features and is easy to manage.
